CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated when an adverse action is approved. This field is used to flag an adverse action workflow. Using a 1 updates this field's stage to complete and status to declined. Using a 0 indicates it requires approval.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If AAF = 1, then the stage is changed to decline by Credit. If AAF = 0, then it is changed by non-credit and requires approval.
CustomField.label: Adverse Action Flag
